data.pricing_trends: Current pricing for round-trip flights from Moscow to Guatemala City ranges from $700 to $1,200, depending on the booking window and airline preferences. Prices are generally lower for bookings made 2-3 months in advance.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking time frame is around 2-3 months ahead of travel to secure the best fares. Last-minute bookings can result in higher prices and limited availability.
data.demand: Guatemala is growing in popularity due to its natural beauty and rich cultural history; demand typically peaks during the dry season from December to April, making autumn more favorable for exploration without large tourist crowds.
data.competition: Alternative destinations include Costa Rica and Mexico, both of which offer similar cultural experiences but may be more crowded during peak seasons and higher in price during holidays.
